data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Jordan Shipley.
In the minute 41, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Andre Ayew.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Jay Fulton is on a sub for Viktor Gyokeres for Swansea.
At St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium, Jake Bidwell has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Liam Kelly is replacing Jordan Shipley for the home team.
In the minute 65, Swansea make their second substitution with Liam Cullen replacing Jamal Lowe.
The home team replace Sam McCallum with Josh Pask.
